headline: A Look At AT&T (T) Valuation As New Fiber Internet Awards Draw Investor Attention
summary: AT&T’s fiber win and what it could mean for the stock AT&T (T) just picked up Ookla’s first ever Best Home Internet award in the U.S., along with its fourth recognition for fastest home internet, putting fresh attention on the company’s fiber strategy. See our latest analysis for AT&T. The fiber recognition comes as AT&T’s 1 month share price return of 20.18% and year to date gain of 15.43% stand out against a softer recent pullback, while the 5 year total shareholder return of 79.53% points...
